post.author: 오승준

comment.author: 부기흡
comment.content: Congrats! Keep up with the excellent work.

post.content:
As a result of the .NET study session, the study group team was able to develop an e-commerce site successfully. The site was built on be half of 'Sparkling' company.



Please visit http://www.sparkling.ca .



Detail information;



  • Platform: Microsoft ASP .NET

  • Language: C#

  • Study Session: 2 hours * 10 Seesions over 6 month(June, 2003 - Nov., 2003)




Participants:



  • Kelly Lee

  • Jin Ho Park

  • Dong Wook Kim

  • Hee Kyung Kim

  • Yoon Hee Park

  • Jong Ku Choi

  • Yong Ki Hong

  • Jae Hong Park

  • Hee Jung Jin

  • Young Sil Kim

  • Min Soo Kim


Team Leader:



  • Sung Joon Oh


Special thanks to Kelly Lee and Jin Ho Park who made the most contribution
during the session. Also, I would like to thanks to Dong Wook(Andy) Kim and
Kelly Lee for offering the place.
post.title: Proudly present E-Commerce Site: sparkling.ca
